channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Amber light not working on trafffic light, 23rd July
item.description:
Light number 12 (for exiting Stoke Road at Odessa Inn junction onto A38 )
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Speed and no large Lorrie’s sign unreadable, 23rd July
item.description:
The signs as you come into Uckington have faded and are unreadable. Please can they be replaced as these are leading to large vehicles coming through the village. Diversions are soon to be put in place on other roads which could lead to more traffic through Uckington and Elmstone Hardwicke so signs are needed asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Road signs faded and unreadable, 23rd July
item.description:
On the entrance to Elmstone Hardwicke the signs including no Lorrie’s/Trucks over a certain tonnage are faded and unreadable. The road continues to Uckington which has its own signs that area also faded - I will report those separately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: Aggressive cows, 23rd July
item.description:
Field next to St Paul’s Church in Leckhampton on the Church Lane in Cheltenham. Field next to it has a Cotswold Way Walk for public right of way through the field. It goes up towards Leckhampton Hill
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter by play area, 23rd July
item.description:
Old Pates' field is really littered at present but this corner is particularly bad

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Grove, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No cycling sign partly obscured by foliage, 23rd July
item.description:
Mini island at Green Lane and Drews Court. A footpath/alleyway leading from here going north down to the car park. The sign really needs to re-sited and bolted to the gate below where it will be clearly visible. Lots of lads just ride down the pathway at speed, they say they do see the existing sign! Accidents waiting to happen!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drews Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
